articles.author: Rob Davies
articles.title: British American Tobacco halts Russia sales after U-turn - The Guardian
articles.description: Owner of brands including Rothmans had said it would still sell products – but will now pull out
articles.content:
British American Tobacco has reversed its decision to continue selling cigarettes and other nicotine products in Russia, putting the sudden change of heart down to its ethos and values.

articles.title: Lucky Cork investors who backed Clonakilty start up set to cash in on huge deal - Cork Beo
articles.description: The West Cork company is currently striking a big business deal with America's largest bank
articles.content:
A Clonakilty start-up is in talks with Americas biggest bank, which could lead to a huge pay day for the hundreds of Cork backers with shares in the business.
